summary: In a world where animals have turned on humanity, a teen travels across the country in search of the girl of his dreams.
cast: Greg Hoople|Stephanie Motta|Adam Schonberg|Nikki Preston|Charles Bigelow|Phillip Musumeci|Katie LeVander|Melissa Orioli|Laura Blank|Tricia Dalusio|Brittany Cerra|Renee Radwan|Justine Turner|Max Roth|Charlie Roth|Casey Daggett|Phillip Cleague|Jim Toepper|Romeal Hogan|Bill Wojcik|Tyler Gilbert|Jonathan Vender|Michael Vender|Isaac Holze|Chris Wojcik|Jeremiah Franco|Chris Vranos|Geoffrey Alan Rhodes|Pat Bateman|John Laura|Jacob T. Emery|Luke Northrop|Jonas Pachuski
title: Rise of the Animals
